item.title: [pi]java.lang.NullPointerException rep ++
item.dc:creator: @crazyfazespy crazyfazespy
item.description:
@crazyfazespy wrote:

This is my dragon claws spec error then i was disabled curses it worked but now it seems cant applysoulsplit to it so it dont work
here a picture of how error looks. It comes then i use special on player

And here is my dragon claws special codes it client class

if(clawDelay > 0) { clawDelay--; } if (overloadcounter > 0) { startAnimation(2383); dealDamage(10); handleHitMask(10); overloadcounter -= 1; getPA().refreshSkill(3); } if(clawDelay == 1) { delayedDamage = clawDamage/2; delayedDamage2 = (clawDamage/2)+1; if(clawType == 2) { getCombat().applyNpcMeleeDamage(npcIndex, 1); } if(clawType == 1) { getCombat().applyPlayerMeleeDamage(clawIndex, 1, clawDamage/2); } if(clawType == 2) { getCombat().applyNpcMeleeDamage(npcIndex, 2); } if(clawType == 1) { getCombat().applyPlayerMeleeDamage(clawIndex, 2, (clawDamage/2) + 1); } clawDelay = 0; specEffect = 0; previousDamage = 0; usingClaws = false; clawType = 0;

and here is a soulsplit apply to damage1 and damage2 it combatAssitant class. so it the point double hit apply fine

Server.playerHandler.players[i].updateRequired = true; applySmite(i, damage); applySoul(i, damage); if (damage2 != -1) applySmite(i, damage2); applySoul(i, damage2);

I would like to know how to add apply to d claw special in combatassitant or client class
and i would like to see how it would look please samone help will rep ++

Read full topic
